#summary How to parse the purchase state in PHP?

= How to parse the purchase state in PHP? =

The purchase state JSON contains 2 long values : "nonce" and "purchaseTime", which will overflow the PHP integer type if you try using 
<code language="php">
$purchase = json_decode($json);
</code>

If you have PHP >= 5.4.0, you can use :
<code language="php">
$purchase = json_decode($json, false, 512, JSON_BIGINT_AS_STRING);
</code>
